titles.title: Providing for consideration of motions to suspend the rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 105-53, by Mr. Dreier.
Providing for considerations of motions to suspend the rules on Wednesday, April 16, 1997.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 15.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 223 - 199 (Roll no. 79).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 4/14/1997--Introduced. Makes it in order at any time on April 16, 1997, for the Speaker of the House of Representatives to entertain motions that the House suspend the rules.
